title: Allied Health students protest in Colombo
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Students from the Allied Health Sciences Students Union who were engaged in a protest, entered the premises of the Health Ministry on Wednesday (6) afternoon.
The students marched to the Ministry of Health Premisses from Vihara Maha Devi Park in Colombo.
President must go for us to consider any proposal – Anura Kumara
